list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add image upload and product update functionality
Refactored the ImagesSection component to use base64 encoding for image uploads and updated the server with these images. Implemented the product update functionality to save product details including images, materials, stones, and fils to the server. This change improves the product management UX and ensures data consistency across components.

task.summary:
Add Loader component and integrate into AppRoutes
Refactor the Suspense fallback in AppRoutes to use a new Loader component, providing a consistent loading experience with a customized message. This change improves the UI by visually enhancing the loading state and maintaining consistent layout structures across pages. Rendering of Navbar and Footer is conditioned on non-admin routes to keep the interface clean and relevant.

Add delete functionality for promo codes
Implemented the ability to delete promo codes from the admin UI, including a new button styled with the theme's error color. The DeleteCodePromo function in the CodesPromoService makes an API call to remove promo codes, and navigation is handled to redirect upon successful deletion.

Add image upload and product update functionality
Refactored the ImagesSection component to use base64 encoding for image uploads and updated the server with these images. Implemented the product update functionality to save product details including images, materials, stones, and fils to the server. This change improves the product management UX and ensures data consistency across components.

This change improves the UI by visually enhancing the loading state and maintaining consistent layout structures across pages. Rendering of Navbar and Footer is conditioned on non-admin routes to keep the interface clean and relevant.

Add delete functionality for promo codes
Implemented the ability to delete promo codes from the admin UI, including a new button styled with the theme's error color. The DeleteCodePromo function in the CodesPromoService makes an API call to remove promo codes, and navigation is handled to redirect upon successful deletion.

Add image upload and product update functionality
Refactored the ImagesSection component to use base64 encoding for image uploads and updated the server with these images. Implemented the product update functionality to save product details including images, materials, stones, and fils to the server. This change improves the product management UX and ensures data consistency across components.
